name: Apple iPhone
description: Accidentally broke your iPhone? We can repair your phone for you. Skip the lines at the Genius Bar and get your iPhone fixed in 30 minutes at Lakemba Mobile King.
details: Having an iPhone is one of the best mobile options out there. You’re interconnected with Apple’s ecosystem and it’s generally a seamless experience to use. Having a widely used phone also means you have a wide range of options to get your phone fixed. Visit our store in Lakemba to get it fixed on the spot, or we can come to you and fix your phone at home. No matter how big or small the issue is, our team of highly trained specialists at Lakemba Mobile King can help you out.
subDetails: We provide free quotes for mobile repair services like: Broken Screen Replacement, Battery Replacement, Charging Problem Issues, Broken Back Glass Replacement, Liquid Damage Repairs and much more.
serviceList: iPhone back panel repair and replacement
iPhone power button repair and replacement
